# <-------------------------- 72 characters --------------------------> |
# To disable Intelligent Test Runner for this commit, uncomment the
# following line
# ITR:NoSkip

# To force run extra suites in CircleCI on top of what's detected,
# uncomment as needed

# To force run all test suites:
# CircleCI:all

# To force run selectively, separated by commas like:
# CircleCI:django,flask,wsgi

# CircleCI suites are:
# aiobotocore, aiohttp, aiomysql, aiopg, algoliasearch, appsec, appsec_iast,
# appsec_iast_memcheck, appsec_integrations, aredis, asgi, asyncpg, asynctest, aws_lambda,
# botocore, bottle, cassandra, celery, cherrypy, ci_visibility, consul, datastreams,
# ddtracerun, debugger, django, django_hosts, djangorestframework, dogpile_cache,
# elasticsearch, falcon, fastapi, flask, gevent, graphene, graphql, grpc, gunicorn,
# httplib, httpx, integration_agent, integration_testagent, internal, jinja2, kafka,
# kombu, langchain, logbook, loguru, mako, mariadb, molten, mongoengine, mysqlconnector,
# mysqlpython, openai, opentelemetry, opentracer, profile, psycopg, pylibmc, pymemcache,
# pymongo, pymysql, pynamodb, pyodbc, pyramid, pytest, redis, rediscluster, requests, rq,
# sanic, snowflake, sourcecode, sqlalchemy, starlette, stdlib, structlog, subprocess,
# telemetry, test_logging, tornado, tracer, unittest, urllib3, vendor, vertica, wsgi,
# yaaredis
